column2: I am very curious of the proposed nicotine reduction policie's effects on the topic at hand. This policy is supposed to lead to millions of additional smokers quitting. Making cigarettes non-addictive can only help.
I am curious to know what happened in 2003 that we see substatial drops in prevalence, taxes and indoor bans.
How do ecigs figure into your analysis?
Miscarriages will be tough to analyze. Mine isn't recorded on my medical record or in any death record. Too early in the pregnancy. And yes, I smoked at the time.
